meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unchangeable.
meanings.sent1: The immutablenesses of the ancient ruins amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the immutablenesses of natural laws to understand the universe.
meanings.sent3: The immutablenesses of the stubborn cat's routine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as strong as the immutablenesses of the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of the immutablenesses of historical facts.

meanings.definition: The inability to be altered or modified.
meanings.sent1: The immutablenesses of the rules must be respected by all players.
meanings.sent2: The immutablenesses of the contract ensured fair treatment for both parties.
meanings.sent3: The immutablenesses of the recipe made it impossible to change any ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His decision showed the immutablenesses of his resolve.
meanings.sent5: The immutablenesses of her opinion were clear in every discussion.
